DescriptionData.Title: Jutek BM800 Condenser Microphone Studio Sound Recording Broadcasting with Shock Mount 3.5mm Audio Cable Sponge Microphone
DescriptionData.Description:
This professional condenser microphone adopts the exacting complete eleconic circuit conol and gold-plate diaphragm capsule. The microphone is with a good cardioid polar pickup pattern, high output, low noise and the accurate reproduction of even the most subtle sound. It;s perfectly suitable for studios, recording studios, oadcasting, stage performance.
Features: [Clear and Acute Voice] This professional adopts the exacting complete eleconic circuit conol and gold-plate diaphragm capsule. The microphone is with a good cardioid polar pickup pattern, high output, low noise and the accurate reproduction of even the most subtle sound. [Shock Mount And Sponge Microphone] It effectively prevents shaking when recording. And Sponge Microphone greatly isolate airflow noise and prevent splashing. [Metal Mesh] Adopting metal mesh, it makes sure voice pickup effect. At the same time, it provide better recording effect and drop resistance. [High Quality Audio Line] Adopting high quality corrosion built-in three stitches, the audio line has stable frequency and clear sound quality. It requires 48V phantom power or external sound card to achieve the clear and high sound output. [Applicable Occasion] Professional condenser microphone is perfectly suitable for studios, recording studios, oadcasting, stage performance. It;s suitable for laptop or desktop computers with 3.5mm audio jack.
Specification: Polar Pattern: Uni-directional Frequency Response: 20Hz-20kHz Sensitivity: -34Db +-2Db (0Db1V/Pa at 1kHz) Output Impedance: 150ohm +-30% (at 1kHz) Loading Impedance: >1000ohm Equivalent Noise Level: 16dBA Max.SPL: 130Db (at 1kHz1% T.H.D) S/N Ratio: 78Db Elecical Current: 3mA Main Item : Approx. 15.7 * 4.8 * 4.8cm / 6.18 * 1.89 * 1.89in Main Item Weight: Approx. 205g / 7.21oz Package : Approx. 20.8 * 14.7 * 6cm / 8.19 * 5.79 * 2.36in Package Weight: Approx. 513g / 18.08oz
Note: 1.This Microphone requires 48V phantom power(when used with Amplifier
